action.msg: (Shit. This is a lot different than just punching someone.)
(Doesn't help that I just now realized that, they're not alone.)
*Hallow claps their hands, making a song that sounds familiar to the face they're wearing.*
(After throwing a few punches, I can also tell that there's one... three... maybe five other ghosts in the room...)
They're all cheering you on, aren't they?
So that's where you're getting your power from. You feed off of your lackeys.
Shit, I guess I really am outnumbered.
There's not much I can do here... I'm going to lose!...
*Hallow begins to slowly inch closer towards Fever, clutching an empty painting in their hands...*
Hah. Did the big, bad, boss ghost get scared just by a little "boo?"
And here I thought you'd actually live up to the face you're wearing.
But I guess that, even a powerful spirit like you can sense fear. How reassuring~.
(Stay calm, Fever. I know you want to beat them with your fists, just like how you've always handled life when things got rough.)
Hang on, Tea. I'll finish this quickly.
